title: Test
yAxis: Life expectancy at birth in years
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Life expectancy at birth in years, with a total of 11 data points.
Overall Life expectancy at birth in years has decreased over the Year.
Life expectancy at birth in years is roughly constant from 2007 to 2008, gradually decreasing from 2008 to 2014, and lastly roughly constant from 2014 to 2017.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
Max Life expectancy at birth in years about 78.04 was recorded at Year 2007
Min Life expectancy at birth in years about 77.83 was recorded at Year 2016, and 2017
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Life expectancy at birth in years, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2007 to 2016.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is extremely constant which exists from 2016 to 2017.
